subject: [Radiance-general] error no valid view specified
body:
Hi Nithya,

This belongs in the non-existent FAQ.  Did you run a search on evalglare in the mailing list?

The "getinfo -d" command only reports the dimensions, not the view.  If you run getinfo without the -d, you should see a line of the form:

VIEW= [various -v options]

If you don't, then that is your problem with evalglare.  Where did the picture originate?

Best,
-Greg
